name: Make Bagel
description:
You try your best to make a bagel, to no avail. You are a victim of circumstances out of your control.

controlled by WASD, mouse, and M1

tab to unlock mouse (not necessary), V to skip forward (in case of bug)

Developed by Hawaii GMTKGJ team:
